trans-unit.source: Provides a text view adapter class for the XHTML adapter set.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
The control adapters in the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters> namespace provide XHTML rendering and processing for mobile controls on a variety of display devices.
Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlTextViewAdapter"></xref> class.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
Returns a strongly typed reference to the associated control.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
A <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextView"></xref>.
Renders the control and its content to the client using the provided <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter"></xref> object.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
Many mobile devices require large pieces of text to be broken up into chunks so that the user can read the text piece by piece.

The Render method uses related properties on the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextView> control to determine which elements to render with the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlTextViewAdapter.RenderElement%2A> method.
An <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter"></xref> object.
Renders the element and a subset of its text content to the client.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
The RenderElement method is called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlTextViewAdapter.Render%2A> method to render the element and portion of the text to the client.
An <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter"></xref> object.
An integer indicating which chunk of text is being rendered.
The starting index of the substring to render.
The ending index of the substring to render.
The value -1 indicates the end of the text.
